Address.label: Address
Address.value: JAMES JOYCE STREET,METROPOLITAN BUILDING, DUBLIN 1, D01 K0Y8, Ireland

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aon is a leading global provider of insurance and reinsurance brokerage and human resource solutions. Its operations are tilted toward its brokerage operations. Headquartered in London, Aon has about 50,000 employees and operations in 120 countries around the world.
